title: SSP EMI / RFI Conductive Silicones
content:
SRP exceeds customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. SRP can custom fabricate SSP conductive silicone to customer specifications.

SSP supplies a full line of EMI / RFI shielding materials as compression-molded sheet stock, and as continuous rolls. In this way, SRP can convert SSP’s conductive silicones into shielding gaskets via the most efficient, cost-effective method. Many of the particle-filled silicones that SSP has developed meet the MIL-DTL-83528C specification for military applications. Commercial-grade materials are available for automotive, aerospace, satellite communications, unmanned systems, and other electronic applications that require EMI and RFI suppression.
description: Conductive silicone for EMI and RFI shielding gaskets. Contact SRP to get a quote on your next project requiring custom EMI and RFI gaskets.

blocks.content:
• Ultra thin sheets and rolls, as thin as .009”
  • Continuous rolls
  • Reinforced EMI/RFI silicones
  • Superior nickel coated graphite silicones with performance levels of silver coated products
  • Ultra soft silicones as low as 30 shore A, availible in nickel coated and silver coated products

blocks.title: Applications

materials.title: Silicone
materials.content: SRP has been providing custom converted silicone gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.Silicone is a high-performance elastomer with exceptional properties that make this an ideal material for a high performance applications.
materials.description: SRP has been providing custom converted silicone gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

suppliers.title: Specialty Silicone Products (SSP)
suppliers.content:
SSP has a reputation for developing “Silicones that Work” and delivering them to customers with speed, flexibility, and service.

Particle-Filled Shielding Silicones

Specialty Silicone Products Inc. (SSP) supplies electrically-conductive silicone elastomers that provide shielding against electromagnetic interference (EMI) and radio frequency interference (RFI). Many of the particle-filled silicones that SSP has developed meet the MIL-DTL-83528C specification for military applications. Commercial-grade materials are available for automotive, aerospace, satellite communications, unmanned systems, and other electronic applications that require EMI and RFI suppression.

Military and Aerospace Silicones

Specialty Silicone Products Inc. (SSP) supplies high-purity platinum cure and peroxide cure silicones that meet specific application requirements.Since 1989, SSP has formulated and manufactured more than 1,000 different silicone compounds to meet the needs of clients in various industries, including aerospace and defense.

Platinum Cure Silicone Elastomers

SSP-2390 is a series of ultra-clean, platinum-catalyzed, heat-cured silicone elastomers that are available in various durometers (Shore A). Platinum cured silicone rubber has stronger physical properties and lower shrinkage values than peroxide cure compounds, and does not produce offgassing or catalyst byproducts. SSP’s platinum cure silicones are cost-effective, and combine high-purity with FDA, USP Class VI*, and RoHS compliance.
suppliers.description: SSP has a reputation for developing “Silicones that Work” and delivering them to customers with speed, flexibility, and service.
